name: AbigAil
description:
Made for Wowie Jam 4.0 in 3 days

Play as unnamed scientist, who trains her liitle robot.
Switch memory modules and solve puzzles to continue AbigAil's training.
Don't forget to help AbigAil get to the end of the  room with you!

To switch AbigAil's memory module, call her (press E) and there will be pop up window. Press 1,2 or 3 to choose the correct module.

If you have lost AbigAil press R to restart the game.

  • Sounds - www.mixkit.co
  • Additional sound effects from www.zapsplat.com
  • Music - www.soundcloud.com

Coding - MrCrazyFork
Art - Littoralie

Thank you for playing!
